|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;N2800; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.86 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Transcend;TS4GUFM-H; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = CMOS Serial |fla2_num = 2 |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L1606EM2I-12G; |flash2size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Crucial;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Intel;WG82574L; |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:22:4D

|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, PCIe x1, SATA 2 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 8-19 |pwr_amp_dc = 8 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VGA out, HDMI 1.3, eDP, LVDS, RTC w/ battery, UART, Audio in (3.5mm), Audio out (3.5mm), SPDIF, fan headers, heat sink |addchip = Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3243C;;2;,,, USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Alcor Micro;AU6256;;1;,,, 7.1+2 Channel High Def Audio Codec;Realtek;ALC888S;;1;,,, DisplayPort to LVDS Converter;Parade Technologies;PS8625;;1;,,, LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;W83627DHG;;1;,,, Platform Controller Hub;Intel;CG82NM10;;1;,,, Notebook System Power Controller;TI;TPS51220A;;1;,,, 6-Differential Channel 1:2 DP/PCIe Gen2 Display Mux;Pericom;PI3PCIE2612;;1;,,, 2-Lane PCI Express 2:1 Mux/DeMux Switch;Pericom;PI3PCIE2415;;1;,,, PCI Express Gen 2 Clock Synthesizer;Silego;SLG505YC264C;;1;,,, 3+1 and 1+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL9583;;1;,,, 14A 30V P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP6679GM;;1;,,, 24A 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7410;;2;,,, 36A 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7702A;;2;,,, 42A 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS0312S;;1;,,, 44A 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;ON Semi;NTMFS4926N;;1;,,, 30V Asymmetric Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4932;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS7692;;3;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17304Q3;;4;,,, Low Power Dual Operational Amplifier;Diodes Inc.;AP358;;2;,,, Synchronous 4-Switch Buck-Boost Controller;Linear Technology;LTC3780;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0109;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Mitac |manuf_model = DN2800MT |manuf_rev = G23738-803 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM: '''[[Mitac]]''' ''International Corp.'' DN2800MT (Intel)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] N2800 Dual-Core (@1.86GHz) *Memory: 1GB ''Crucial'' DDR3 (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 2MB (CMOS) Serial Flash, :4GB USB Flash, 2x SATA 2 ports *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 8-19V, 8A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Ihiji INV-APP-1100 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Ihiji INV-APP-1100 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Ihiji INV-APP-1100 Internal view.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== ===Models=== *[[Ihiji INV-APP-500]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-750]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-1100]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-2100]]
